reviewText: The leavishly composed cover art for this hitman classic makes me yern for the chunky tomato ketcups of yore that I you used to drown my favorite steak fries in.  Don't worry steak fires I'll save you, quick jump into my  mouth. Hurry!, there's no time.  Vengeance my be theirs but the steak fries  are mine. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
